meanings.sent2: She reperked the wilting flowers by giving them fresh water and sunlight.

meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for the project was reperking like a dormant volcano ready to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The morning sunshine reperked the sleepy town, bringing life back to the streets.
